description: Associated works to separate the upper floors from the ground floor to create an independent unit above the existing retail bank. Internal works involve blocking up the doorway between the entrance vestibule and the front staircase to first floor; blocking up the doorway between the rear office area on the first floor and the rear staircase, and associated security upgrades to the surrounding walls; installation of a new air conditioning split system in the basement for additional server cabinet; installation of Securilath steel mesh within the ceiling void on the ground floor, below the existing suspended ceiling system; isolating and disconnecting all services  related to electrical circuits, fire alarm, heating and water, to create an independent area above the ground floor bank. (Listed Building Consent)
